name: Blood4Blood
description:
You work at the blood transfusion department of the vampire medical castle and charged to select the humans that will save your brothers.

Choose carefully the target to sacrifice depending on its blood analysis and the needs of the vampires. 

But be careful, bad blood is lethal for us...

This game was made in less than 72 hours for the MiniGameJam 118 with the "Vampire" theme, and "Blood is lethal" limitation. 

Hope you'll enjoy
